snippet: A deepening drought that has affected 2.5 million Puerto Ricans forced the government on Wednesday to extend severe water rationing measures to more communities.
abstract: Drought in Puerto Rico prompts officials there to extend severe water rationing measures to additional 180,000 customers, raising total to 400,000.
lead_paragraph: A deepening drought that has affected 2.5 million Puerto Ricans forced the government on Wednesday to extend severe water rationing measures to more communities.

headline.main: Puerto Rico: Water Rationing Is Extended
headline.print_headline: Puerto Rico: Water Rationing Is Extended
